/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The street itself is paved with asphalt, and there are streetlights lining the sides, ready to illuminate the area as dusk falls. In the distance, the majestic mountains rise against the sky, adding depth and a sense of scale to the image. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. Overall, the image provides a detailed and vivid depiction of a typical day on a street in Beijing.
